channel.title: ~[SERVER TOOL] Project Universal [SERVER TOOL]~
channel.description:
[center][img]http://picasion.com/pic7/08709e511f8d30859cad91216f897812.gif[/img] [b]Introduction:[/b] Hello everyone, I have started to get into server tools and just noticed that there are not many server control panel's out there that are actually universal, not just something that opens up with your server. So I have decided to make one just to help out the community and possibly turn a few heads.
[b]Features:[/b] -Easy banning -Easy muting -Easy item spawning -Barely any typing involved -Very easy to use -Working item, npc, and object list
[b]The Ups:[/b] -I am not basing this off anything (made from scratch) -You can use it on any server -I am making a log in box (only staff can use it) -It will be in .exe form
[b]The Downs:[/b] -Some Bugs still need to be fixed -I need to do some more work to keep this out of the hands of hackers
[b]Other:[/b] If you have any suggestions please tell me so I can add them into my program and you might get some credit out of the end product.
[b]Pictures:[/b] [i]Pictures will be released soon.[/i]
[b]Process:[/b] [i]Done![/i] = Process Completed [i]Working...[/i] = In Construction [i]Paused.[/i] = Haven't Started Yet
Program Base - [i]Done![/i] Command Box - [i]Done![/i] Insert Code - [i]Working...[/i] Log in Box - [i]Working...[/i] Hacker Prevention - [i]Paused.[/i] Universalization Codes - [i]Paused.[/i] Compatibility Test - [i]Paused.[/i]
[img]http://picasion.com/pic7/08709e511f8d30859cad91216f897812.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: ~[SERVER TOOL] Project Universal [SERVER TOOL]~
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:267323”][quote author=Da 0wnz link=topic=352927.msg2706685#msg2706685 date=1237039730]

Hacker prevention? Stumped there.

And what language?

English lol and I’m going to try my hardest to keep it out of untrustworthy hands.
[/quote]
He means what computer language! Vb wont be safe.[/quote]

Oh wow… I feel retarded wasn’t thinking =P. And yes I’ll probably write it in VB. I don’t know yet. I might wait to see when the project is done on what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: ~[SERVER TOOL] Project Universal [SERVER TOOL]~
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

[center]
Introduction:
Hello everyone, I have started to get into server tools and just noticed that there are not many server control panel’s out there that are actually universal, not just something that opens up with your server. So I have decided to make one just to help out the community and possibly turn a few heads.

Features:
-Easy banning
-Easy muting
-Easy item spawning
-Barely any typing involved
-Very easy to use
-Working item, npc, and object list

The Ups:
-I am not basing this off anything (made from scratch)
-You can use it on any server
-I am making a log in box (only staff can use it)
-It will be in .exe form

The Downs:
-Some Bugs still need to be fixed
-I need to do some more work to keep this out of the hands of hackers

Other:
If you have any suggestions please tell me so I can add them into my program and you might get some credit out of the end product.

Pictures:
Pictures will be released soon.

Process:
Done! = Process Completed
Working… = In Construction
Paused. = Haven’t Started Yet

Program Base - Done!
Command Box - Done!
Insert Code - Working…
Log in Box - Working…
Hacker Prevention - Paused.
Universalization Codes - Paused.
Compatibility Test - Paused.

[/center]

Read full topic
